channel.title: Barry Diller on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Barry Diller on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: John Malone and His Media Mogul Proteges Break Down the Billionaire’s Biggest Deals
item.description: Malone appeared in person at the Paley Center for Media Thursday, in a panel that also included David Zaslav, Barry Diller and Mike Fries.
